body.name: Under Cabinet Lights, 63 LED Rechargeable Battery Operated Motion Sensor Light Indoor, 2 Pack Magnetic Dimmable Closet Lights, Wireless Under Counter Lights for Kitchen, Stairs, Hallway (14.7inch)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 38 mins
features: 👍[Upgraded Motion Sensor Under Cabinet Lights]: Setting the under cabinet lights on motion sensor mode, they auto-on when human motion is detected within 120°and 10ft in a dark or low light environment, and auto-off after about 20 seconds of no motion detected. No longer have to worry about tripping on the step in the dark trying to turn on the switch.

👍[Always-on Mode]: The under counter lights for kitchen can be also be set to be always-on, or off. The always-on feature allows you use the motion sensor lights on daytime for a long time task. It can be used in reading, camping and as a flashlight.

👍[Upgraded Dimmable Closet Lights]: The cabinet lights are bright and eye-protection, thanks to 63pcs LED energy-saving LEDs and a glare-free frosted cover. In addition, unlike fixed brightness of others', our motion sensor light indoor has 5 levels of brightness. So the dimmable under cabinet lighting allows you to brighten them for task like meal preparation and dim them for a motion sensor night light without waking other people up at midnight.

👍[USB-C Rechargeable Under Cabinet Lights Wireless]: These under cabinet lights built-in a 2000mAh rechargeable battery and can be easily recharged via type-C cable. Don’t worry about wiring, available outlets or battery replacement like other styles. One full charge can last up to 7-30 days on Motion Sensor Mode(depends on how often you use) and 6 hours on Always-on Mode at 100% brightness. Note that the USB wall adapter is not included.

👍[Easy Installation & Wide Usage]: With built-in strong magnets, these closet lights are easy to install, no need for an electrician. It can be adsorbed directly on ironwork surfaces. Or use the included adhesive metal plates to stick on anywhere you want. That also means it’s easy to take off and put back on when it needs a charge. Great under counter lights for kitchen, clooset, cupboard, pantry, basement, stairs, hallway, bookshelf, etc.
body.description: Are you looking for some lights to brighten up your cabinet, dark pantry and closet where an electric outlet is not available? If so, convenient rechargeable motion sensor closet lights will be a smart solution. MCGOR Wireless Motion Sensor Under Cabinet Lights will turn on automatically when you close to cabinet and closet and eliminate dangling cords or unsightly plugs. Bring great convenience to your life.

productInformation.name: Included Components
productInformation.value: ‎✅ 2X Usb-C Charging Cords, ✅ 6X Adhesive iron plates, ✅ 1 x User Manual, ✅ 2X Cabinet Lights

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great!
reviews.reviewText: Few reasons to give this a 5 star.1) I appreciate no batteries needed. It has a cord with USB port for charging2) they are held up with magnet strips w/adhesive back. So you can take the lights off and on and don't have to be too exact when positioning under the cabinets. Made for super easy install - Also makes for easy RE charging. It has a button that is red while charging and turns green when fully charged.3) the motion detector works well. it is a little slower than would like, but overall pretty reactive.4) you have different levels of brightness, which I loved having the control over - under cabinetry was more dim, or closet area where i prefer brighter light, adjusting was easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, bright rechargeable motion-sensing LED lights
reviews.reviewText: These are bright, rechargeable, motion-sensing LED lights that are super easy to install. They feel high-quality and I highly recommend them. I will buy more! They're nice and thin, so they're perfect for installing in tight spaces or if you want them to be hidden.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Comes as a pair. Charges quickly. Using one to light a basement stairwell with the other in reserve. It's been going on and off religiously at least 4-5 times a day for 3 weeks and still hasn't required recharging.Has two short charging cords, extra magnetic mounting plates, screws and decent instructions. The light is bright and adjustable. The motion detector is sensitive enough to do the job but not annoying. And the light turns off in 30 seconds or so if unattended. Excellent value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to add more light to dark places
reviews.reviewText: These were easy to install and work really well. I have it set on auto, so they light up each time I walk by or even when pets walk by. The only downside is that I have to charge just about every day, so the charge does not last that long, and I don't want to keep them plugged into the outlet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great motion light with dimmer
reviews.reviewText: Nothing bad to say here. The magnet in them is very strong. Worked great inside of my safe. Battery life is phenomenal. Theyre solid and have a good weight to them. The dimmer button is an awesome touch!If you’re mounting directly to something magnetic just simply attach. Or if you need light elsewhere, the mounting plates are easy to install.Ordering another set for the toolbox!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed lights in my stereo cabinet to illuminate my albums. These were very easy to install, look good and do the job. The "auto" mode is excellent -- the motion sensor turns on the light when I open the cabinet door and then turns off in about 15 seconds after it's closed. I liked them so much I bought two more for other cabinets. I was concerned about recharging but that's no problem since they're magnetic. So once you mount the metal plates, the light is easily comes on and off. Tip - - The plates are already installed on the back and it appears they are adhered - they're not - - just pull them off for installation - - they're only magnetically placed there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and versatile
reviews.reviewText: The package contains 2 lights and 2 charging cords and enough self stick magnetic mounts for 3 locations so you can move them from spot to spot. I bought these for under my kitchen wall cabinets and they work well. I can relocate one of them as needed. They are thin so you do not see them tucked up under framed cabinets. The light isn’t super bright but bright enough for reading a cookbook or doing tasks. They charge very quickly and you can either turn them off and on as needed or set the auto feature which works well. I'm very happy with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great little light. I was surprised at how bright the little light is and the adjustable brightness is a great feature. Holds better charge for a good amount of time and the motion sensor is great. Love the magnetic backing that makes for easy removal to charge the light when needed.
